```{r}
minmax<-function(x)
{
  (max(x,na.rm=T)-min(x,na.rm=T))
}


v1<-c(10,20,30,5,1000)
minmax(v1)
```

```{r}
sapply(df,minmax)
```

Normalization of data values

(x-min())/(max()-min())


```{r}
v1<-c(1,2,3,4)
```


```{r}
normalize1<-function(x)
{
  (x-min(x,na.rm=T))/((max(x,na.rm=T)-min(x,na.rm=T)))
}

v1<-c(1,2,3,4)
normalize1(v1)
```


```{r}
Caldiff<-function(x)
{
     y<-(x-min(x,na.rm=T))/(max(x,na.rm=T) - min(x,na.rm=T))
      
    return(y)
}


v1<-c(1,2,3,4)
Caldiff(v1)

```
